The Neurotransmitter Project

Screw neurotransmitters, the brain should use the blockchain to communicate

Neurotransmitter

A chemical messenger that allows for electrical signals from neurons to be transmitted to the postsynaptic neuron or effector target.

Neurotransmitters

Amino Acids

- Arginine

Biogenic Amines (Monoamines)

- Dopamine - Noradrenaline

Lipids

- Anandamide

Purines

- Adenosine

Trace Amines

- Phenethylamine

Amino Acids

- Arginine
